short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy screen grabber tool with the press of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnapGrab Pro is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to capture screenshots of webpages effortlessly. With just a few clicks, you can save full webpage screenshots, capture only the visible portion of a webpage, or even customize the size of the screenshot to meet your specific needs. Say goodbye to third-party tools and complicated processes â€“ SnapGrab Pro makes web capturing a breeze.
